Translations.Text: ondu likhita kalavannu nigadipadisade navu yava janangavannu nasa madiddilla
tanna nigadita avadhiyannu miri munnadeyalu athava adarinda hinde uliyalu yava samudayakku sadhyavagadu
avaru (dhikkarigalu) helidaru; ‘‘divya upadesa ilisi kodalagiru vavane, ninobba huccane sari
ninu satyavantanagiddare, nineke nam'ma balige malak‌galannu karetaruvudilla?’’
Nijavagi navu malak‌galannu satyadondige matra kaluhisutteve. Adare aga avarige (dhikkarigalige) heccina kalavadhi nidalaguvudilla
khanditavagiyu nave i divya bodhaneyannu ilisi kottavaru mattu khanditavagiyu nave idara sanraksakaragiddeve
Nimaginta hindina janavargagalallu navu (dutarannu) ravanisiddevu
avara balige banda dutaralli yaru apahasyakke tuttagade iralilla
i riti navu adannu (apahasyavannu) aparadhigala manas'sugalolage bittirutteve
avaru idannu (i upadesavannu) nambalararu. Aduve, hindinavara sampradayavagide
ondu vele navu avara palige akasada ondu bagilannu terediddare mattu avaru a mulaka meleruttale iddiddare –
agalu avaru, ‘‘nam'ma drstigalannu vancisalagide, nijavagi nam'mannu mantra mugdhagolisalagide’’ ende heluttiddaru
khanditavagiyu navu akasadalli tara mandalagalannu nirmisidevu mattu navu avugalannu noduvavara palige alankaravagisidevu
mattu navu avugalannu ella sapita saitanarinda suraksitavagittevu
kaddu alisalu prayatnisuvatanannu ondu ujvala benkiyu himbalisuttade
hageye navu bhumiyannu haradidevu mattu adaralli bettagalannu nettevu hagu adaralli ellavannu samarpaka pramanadalli belesidevu
adaralli navu nimagu nivu yara annadatarallavo avarigu jivanopayagalannu odagisidevu
nam'ma bali pratiyondu vastuvina bhandaragale ive. (Adare) navu avugalannu ondu nirdista pramanadalli matra ilisikodutteve
navu niru tumbida galiyannu ravanisidevu mattu navu akasadinda nirannu ilisi adannu nimage kudisidevu. Adenu nim'ma sangrahadalliralilla
khandita nave (ellarannu) jivantagolisuvavaru hagu sayisuvavaragiddeve mattu (antimavagi) nave ellara uttaradhikarigalagirutteve
nim'malli munde dati hodavarannu navu khandita ballevu mattu hinde ulidiruvavarannu navu khandita ballevu
khandita nim'ma odeyane avarellarannu ondede serisuvanu. Avanu khandita tumba yuktivantanu arivu ullavanu agiddane
Khanditavagiyu nave manavanannu kari ave mannina onagareyinda srstisiruvevu
adakkintalu munna navu tiksnavada benkiyinda jinn‌galannu srstisiddevu
nim'ma odeyanu, malak‌galodane higendiddanu; nanu kari ave mannina onagareyinda obba manavanannu srstisaliddene
nanu avanannu sajjugolisi avanalli nanna atmavannu udidaga nivu avanige sastangaveragiri
adarante, ella malak‌galu sastangaveragidaru
adare iblisana horatu. Avanu, sastanga veragidavara jote seralu nirakarisidanu
avanu (allahanu) kelidanu; o iblis, nineke sastangaveragidavara jote seralilla
avanu (iblis) helidanu; ninu avemannina onagareyinda srstisiruva manavanige sastanga veraguvavanu nanalla
avanu (allahanu) helidanu; ninu illinda tolagu. Khanditavagiyu ninu sapitanu
antima vicaraneya dinadavaregu ninna mele sapaviruvudu
avanu helidanu; ‘‘nannodeya, (ella nirjivigalannu) jivantagolisalaguva dinada tanaka nanage kalavakasavannu nidu.’’
Avanu (allahanu) helidanu; ido, ninage kalavakasa nidalagide
– ondu nirdista dinada varege
avanu (iblis) helidanu; nannodeya, ninu nannannu dari tappisiruvudarinda nanu (tappu dariyannu) bhumiyalliruvavarige candaganisuvenu mattu avarellarannu daritappisi biduvenu
avara paiki ninna ayda dasara horatu
avanu (allahanu) helidanu; idu nanna kadegiruva nera marga
khanditavagiyu a nanna dasara mele ninna adhikaravenu nadeyadu – ninnannu anusarisida darigedigala horatu
khanditavagiyu, narakave avarellarige vagdana madalada neleyagide
adakke elu bagilugaliruvavu. Pratiyondu bagiligu avarallina ondu palu nigaditavagide
dharmanistharu khandita totagalalli hagu jharigalalli iruvaru
‘‘Santiyondige hagu suraksitaragi ivugalolage pravesisiri’’ (ennutta avarannu svagatisalaguvudu)
avara edegalalli ulididda vaisamyavannella navu kittesedevu – avaru sahodararagi asanagalalli eduru baduragi kulitiruvaru
alli yava sankatavu avarannu badhisadu mattu avarannendu allinda hora hakalagadu
nanna dasarige tilisi bidiri; nanu khandita tumba ksamisuvavanu mattu tumba karunaluvendu
mattu nanna sikseyu tumba kathora sikseyagiruvudendu
ibrahimara atithigala kuritu avarige tilisiri
avaru, avara balige bandaga ‘salam’ (santi) endaru. Aga avaru (ibrahimaru), namage nim'ma kuritu atankavide endaru
